description:
MyLo which is short for 'My Location' is a great App that let's you send quick texts or emails that include your location. What's really cool is that your location is encoded with a link to Google Maps® so the recipient can click the link and see where you are, or get directions to come meet you. MyLo is simple to set up, simple to use. 

So say you have a flat tire on the freeway and want to call you're friend to come get you.
What if you can't see a street sign to tell them where you are? Just use MyLo and they are able to get directions right to you. What if it's an emergency? MyLo can send your location to a single or multiple email or text addresses.

If you leave the MyLo App open or in card mode, the location windows will continue to update so you can just click 'Send' again to send an update of your location.
versionNote: 1. Fixed bug in app catalog redirect.
